panels.title: Active Channels - Subscriber Count Over Time

targets.expr: sum by (client_name) (redis_pubsub_client_channel_subscriptions) + sum by (client_name) (redis_pubsub_client_pattern_subscriptions) or sum by (client_name) (redis_pubsub_client_channel_subscriptions) or sum by (client_name) (redis_pubsub_client_pattern_subscriptions)
